items.name: NWN2Wiki
items.title: NWN2Wiki
items.headline: NWN2Wiki
items.desc: NWN2Wiki (Neverwinters Nights 2) Wiki is a database that curates information related to Neverwinters Nights 2, the sequel to Neverwinter Nights. It was developed by Obsidian and published by Atari with the assistance of NWN developer BioWare. The first expansion, Mask of the Betrayer, was released Oct 9th, 2007. The second expansion, Storm of Zehir, was released on November 18th, 2008. NWN2 is based on Dungeons and Dragons version 3.5, departing from the original NWN which was based on DnD 3.0.

items.name: Sigil NWN2 PW Wiki
items.title: Sigil NWN2 PW Wiki
items.headline: Learn more about the Sigil: City of Doors Persistent World
items.desc:
A Neverwinter Nights 2 persistent world based on the Dungeons and Dragons Planescape setting.

The Planescape setting was designed by Zeb Cook and turned the previous background information provided in Manual of the Planes and turned it into a fantastic setting for roleplay and adventure. 

Planescape was used as the setting for the highly acclaimed game Planescape: Torment as well as a number of published adventures and supplements.

Set in the outer planes, the realms of the gods and other powers, your character starts their life in Sigil, also known as the Cage or the City of Doors, a torus shaped city floating above an infinite spire at the "center" of the outer planes. From here your character is free to seek their destiny.

The game requires Neverwinter Nights 2, plus the two expansions, and most significantly, you need imagination!
